definition[0]: a number, amount etc that is not exact, but is almost correct
example[0]: Could you give us a rough approximation of the cost?
definition[1]: something that is similar to another thing, but not exactly the same
example[2]: It was the nearest approximation to a crisis sheâ€™d ever experienced.
definition[2]: a number, amount etc that is not exact, but is intended to give an idea of the real number, amount etc
example[3]: The figures are meant to be an approximation of the costs.
definition[3]: something that is similar to another thing but not exactly the same
